name: Lucjan
one: Not like I had other options
If You don't consider starving to death
Michał, Krzychu, this is my friend from childhood I told you about.
Lucjan told us you know somethin about alchemy
Ah, yeah, I've been studying alchemy on Łudź Alchemy University
Aaand I got you the thing You asked for.
Skeleton bone powder was added to your inventory
What do you need this for?
When you combine this with magnesium you can create simple explosive potion
I told you he's a real deal!
Not really. This could be made by any wanna be terrorist in basement.
Press [Tab] to access menu and craft magnesium grenade.
two: We should wait for Master to give us the location of the mining site.
